Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Rededication)

Summary:  Authority for the Parish of Red River to authorize the levy of a 7 mills tax through the year 2022 with the proceeds to be rededicated for the purposes of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating a public library in the Parish, including books, equipment and furnishings therefor, said tax to be levied in lieu of the current tax being levied for library purposes and further authority to rededicate the proceeds of the current tax.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Red River, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a seven (7) mills tax (the "Tax") on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $1,124,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of eleven (11) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2022, to be used for the purposes of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating a public library in said Parish, including books, equipment and furnishings therefor, the Tax to be levied in lieu of a seven (7) mill library tax authorized to be levied through the year 2012 pursuant to an election held on July 20, 2002 (the "2003 Tax"), with the proceeds collected under the 2003 Tax being hereby rededicated for the purposes set forth above?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Fire Prot. Dist. -- 3.50 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Fire Protection District Proposition
(Millage Renewal)

Summary:  10 year, 3.50 mills property tax renewal for operation, maintenance and upgrading of the Parishwide Fire Protection District's buildings and equipment.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parishwide Fire Protection District of the Parish of Red River, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of three and fifty hundredths (3.50) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $406,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022 for the purpose of operation, maintenance and upgrading of the District's buildings and equipment?
